rule: If the given word cannot be tagged with any of the predefined part-of-speech tags, the output is the word 'Unknown', starting with an uppercase 'U' followed by lowercase letters.
input: Sentence: 'She smiled :) after hearing the news.' Word: ':)'
complianceText:
The chatbot's output is "UH", which is one of the part-of-speech tags listed in the description (specifically, it denotes an interjection). The output provides only the part-of-speech tag without any additional information or text, which complies with the requirement to "return just the tag for the word's part of speech." There is no indication of any non-compliance with the description based solely on the given output.

No violation.
OK
